name: Qantas First Class - pure indulgence on the A380
description:
My first ever flight review was on the Qantas A380 in First Class….now 4 years later I’m getting the chance to experience it again.  Flying from Sydney, Australia all the way to London Heathrow in the pure luxury of Qantas First Class on the Airbus A380.  

This Qantas First Class flight review covers my entire journey starting at the iconic Qantas First Class Lounge in Sydney.  We take off and head to Singapore where I check out the brand-new Qantas First Class Lounge at Singapore’s Changi Airport.  Our journey then continues on to London Heathrow – along the way I’ll show you the Qantas First Class seat, service and entertainment system.  And it wouldn’t be a Qantas First Class flight review without the famous Qantas PJs!

Join me, let’s fly to London. 

Oh yes…here’s the link to my first ever flight review from 4 years ago… https://youtu.be/Mv4kBPUqGQU

Route:     Sydney Australia (SYD) to London Heathrow (LHR) via Singapore (SIN)
Flight:     QF1 Seat 2A
Length:   SYD-SIN  3,916miles, 7:42 hrs
                SIN-LHR  6,769miles, 14:03 hrs
Aircraft:  Airbus A380-842  registration VH-OQC (Aug 2008)
When:    23 Jan 2020

Camera:  Panasonic HC-VX1 & GoPro Hero Max8 Black


This video may not be reproduced without specific permission.

Q&A Video:       https://youtu.be/6VoRFtNDC04
